page_content: Discusses various types of income from activities such as self-employment and unpaid work interruptions.
Discusses the declaration of domestic and foreign securities and their revenues.
Discusses the electronic tax filing options available for the tax period 2003, specifically mentioning TaxMe-CD and TaxMe-Online.
Discusses the taxation of pensions received from private risk insurances.
Provides information on how to declare various types of capital benefits for tax purposes.
